description: Dive into cutting-edge frontend techniques, from WebGL animations and interactive Three.js spheres to dynamic parallax scrolling with GSAP. Master SVG path commands, create responsive layouts like the Nintendo Switch home screen, and explore modern CSS techniques for popovers and borders. Enhance your development workflow with advanced Chrome DevTools tips and discover the potential of scroll-timelines and variable font axes for synchronized animations.
joke: Why do JavaScript developers love coffee? Because they love to 'brew' their code!
challenge: Create an interactive art gallery using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Implement a responsive, infinitely scrolling image grid that features parallax effects and hover-sensitive animations. Utilize the Canvas API to add dynamic backgrounds that react to mouse movement, and challenge yourself to integrate smooth transitions and accessibility features for an engaging user experience.
